bolsa_text:
¿Quieres formar parte de nuestro equipo de trabajo?
Envíanos tu CV y nos pondremos en contacto contigo a la brevedad.
bolsa_title: ÚNETE A NUESTRO EQUIPO DE TRABAJO
contact_text:
Do you have any questions or comments?
Write to us and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
delivery_text:
Our restaurants specialize in Italian cuisine, fresh, authentic, and original.
Everything is handmade daily in our kitchen using traditional and original recipes.
delivery_title: Which branch would you like to reserve?
events_text:
Do you want to hold an event with us? Let us organize your next event in one of our restaurants and exclusive event spaces, each branch has a different dynamic that we can customize for your special event.
Contact us for more information and quotes!
events_title: Private spaces for dinners and events
home_nosotros_text:
Our restaurants specialize in Italian cuisine, fresh, authentic, and original.
Everything is handmade daily in our kitchen using traditional and original recipes in which we combine ingredients imported from their respective regions of Italy with fresh products from each region to offer you a unique culinary experience.
home_nosotros_text2: The wine lists of each restaurant have a variety of labels from around the world, and have been personally selected by our Chef to perfectly complement our menu.
reserva_form_text:
Do you want to hold an event with us?
Each branch has a different dynamic that we can customize for your special event.
reserva_form_title: Private spaces for dinners and events
